Summary: Extra Terrestrials in my neighbor's yard
divs: Sighting DetailsFirst what happened is I woke up because i heard a boom from outside. I was scared out of sleep. i sit up, and I see a white figure in my neighbor's yard. I figure it must be a light, and i try to fall asleep again. It does't work. I think about what it could be, and I sumrised an extra terrestrial. For 30 minutes i was scared like hell to even get up, so i checked my cell phone which was on the table next to me to check the time. it was exactly 6:02. the event has gone from about 5:30 to now, for i currently see the objects while writing the report. i sit up, and i see the figures closer now, so i can make out what they are. Bodies. Paper white bodies in the distance. i stare at the figures longer. I see the figures blink their "heads" on and off, with no particular pattern, as if speaking to one another. Then i see a third one come in. The order of the objects in the window is this fom me: Orange figure far left, short figure middle, a slightly bigger figure to the far right. This orange figure is about twice the size of the other two, and is orange. I heard a great roam from the sky, like the cry of a low wailing engine. I figure it could be their vessel's engine, but i cannot see any crafts. I get up a little bit later to look out the window. I saw them oh so clearly. I saw bodies, two arms, two legs, heads, and on one of them i saw a seperate light coming from the one on the far right. It is square. it seems like a map. they blink their "heads" once again as if in conversation, and i turn on my computer to write this report. I am but 15, so i am scared shitless, shaking more than i ever have in my entire life, pardon my french. I talk to my friend and she says she wishes to see the figures as well, while i do have a webcam, it is too late. I look out one last time, and they vanish. I heard another engine sound, loud and clear, and then nothing. Only the wind remains now.
trends: There have been no other sightings in East Hampton
This sighting has never been favorited.
